mapper.select:
select
from sys_user_online
AND ipaddr like concat('%', #{vo.ipaddr}, '%')
AND login_name like concat('%', #{vo.loginName}, '%')
select from sys_user_online WHERE last_access_time <= #{lastAccessTime} ORDER BY o.last_access_time ASC
